trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供的强类型的集合<xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The InstanceDataCollectionCollection class represents the collection returned from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.ReadCategory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: InstanceDataCollectionCollection 类表示从返回的集合<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.ReadCategory%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.ReadCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: This collection contains all the counter and instance data.
trans-unit.target: 此集合包含的所有计数器和实例的数据。

trans-unit.source: The collection contains an <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection> object for each counter.
trans-unit.target: 该集合包含<xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>对象的每个计数器。</xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection> object contains the performance data for all counters for that instance.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>对象包含的该实例的所有计数器的性能数据。</xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>

trans-unit.source: Thus, the data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name.
trans-unit.target: 因此，数据是创建索引按计数器名称和实例名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance data collection for the specified counter (identified by one of the indexed <xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"></xref> objects) exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的计数器的实例数据集合 (由一个索引标识<xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"></xref>对象) 存在于集合中。

trans-unit.source: The `counterName` parameter is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: `counterName`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection> object in the collection contains the performance data for all counters for an instance.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>对象在集合中的包含的实例的所有计数器的性能数据。</xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>

trans-unit.source: The data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name.
trans-unit.target: 数据被索引按计数器名称和实例名称进行索引。

trans-unit.source: Contains returns `true` if there is an <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection> object whose associated counter has the name specified by the `counterName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 包含返回`true`如果没有<xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>对象，其关联的计数器都有名称指定的`counterName`参数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>

trans-unit.source: The name of the performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 性能计数器的名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an instance data collection containing the specified counter exists in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>集合中的一个实例数据集合，其中包含是否存在指定的计数器否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The counterName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The counterName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Copies an array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"></xref> instances to the collection, at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将复制的数组<xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"></xref>到集合中，指定索引处的实例。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"></xref> instances (identified by the counters they contain) to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"> </xref> （它们所包含的计数器由标识） 的实例将添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The location at which to add the new instances.
trans-unit.target: 在要添加的新实例的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance data for the specified counter.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定的计数器实例数据。

trans-unit.source: The `counterName` parameter is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: `counterName`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection> object in the collection contains the performance data for all counters for an instance.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>对象在集合中的包含的实例的所有计数器的性能数据。</xref:System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection>

trans-unit.source: The data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name.
trans-unit.target: 数据被索引按计数器名称和实例名称进行索引。

trans-unit.source: The indexer uses the `counterName` parameter to step through the counters associated with this collection of instance data.
trans-unit.target: 索引器使用`counterName`参数来单步执行与此集合的实例数据关联的计数器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 性能计数器的名称。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"></xref> item, by which the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection"></xref> object is indexed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollection"> </xref>项，依据<xref href="System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection"></xref>对象进行索引。

trans-unit.source: The counterName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The counterName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the object and counter registry keys for the objects associated with this instance data collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此实例数据集合关联的对象的对象和性能计数器注册表项。

trans-unit.source: Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing.
trans-unit.target: 当它已安装并且将计数器数据，并在执行时，每个软件组件创建其对象和计数器的密钥。

trans-unit.source: You can access this data as you would access any other registry data.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问此数据，如像访问任何其他注册表数据。

trans-unit.source: However, although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以使用注册表收集性能数据，但注册表数据库中不存储数据。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the system collects the data from the appropriate system object managers.
trans-unit.target: 相反，系统从相应的系统对象管理器收集的数据。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that represents a set of object-specific registry keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>表示一组特定于对象的注册表项。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the instance data values that comprise the collection of instances for the counter.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例构成的计数器的实例的集合的数据值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that represents the counter's instances and their associated data values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>表示计数器的实例和其关联的数据值。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
